text: Man...I always like this song. Put now as I listen to it more closely...this truly is a masterpiece. This is why my favorite composers of all time are VG composer andd not concert composers. You can feel every ounce of inspiration through a great song like this, bringing the game to life and allowing you to understand the composer just that much more.
